name: Achievement Hunter: Kiborg
description:
Achievement Hunter: Kiborg

In this 2d action / shooter you will play for the kiborg who wants to stop the aliens who are trying to destroy his city.
You do not have any allies. There are only you, your weapons and a huge number of enemies.
Fight for your home, increase your skill, upgrade weapons and prevent invasion of enemies into your city.

Game features:
Minimum allowable price
Real weapons
Fearless protagonist
